00026 typedef struct linked_nodes {
00027     BaseNode* node;
00028     struct linked_nodes* next;
00029 } linked_nodes;
00030 
00035 class AllNodes {
00036     public:
00037         AllNodes() {nodes = NULL;}
00038 
00039         void register_node(BaseNode* to_register) {
00040             debug("> AllNodes::register_node()");
00041             linked_nodes* cursor;
00042 
00043             if (nodes == NULL) { //Initial registration
00044                 cursor = (linked_nodes*)malloc(sizeof(linked_nodes));
00045                 nodes = cursor;
00046             } else {
00047                 cursor = nodes;
00048 
00049                 while (cursor -> next != NULL) {
00050                     cursor = cursor -> next;
00051                 }
00052 
00053                 cursor -> next = (linked_nodes*)malloc(sizeof(linked_nodes));
00054                 cursor = cursor -> next;
00055             }
00056 
00057             //cursor now points at last element, where we want to tack on the new node.
00058             cursor -> node = to_register;
00059             cursor -> next = NULL;
00060             debug("< AllNodes::register_node()");
00061         }
00062     private:
00063         linked_nodes* nodes;
00064 };
00065 
00066 extern AllNodes valid_nodes;
